testCaseBlueprint.name: 5G EVE Simple UC Multi_site TCB_v2
testCaseBlueprint.resetConfigScript: EXECUTE_COMMAND vnf.ef5faf76-895b-11ea-bc55-0242ac130003.extcp.eth0.ipaddress $$userB:$$passwordB sudo tc qdisc del dev ens4 root
testCaseBlueprint.executionScript: EXECUTE_COMMAND vnf.ef5faf76-895b-11ea-bc55-0242ac130003.extcp.eth0.ipaddress $$userB:$$passwordB sudo tc qdisc add dev ens4 root netem delay 10ms 5ms 25%; EXECUTE_COMMAND vnf.be55660e-8961-11ea-bc55-0242ac130003.extcp.eth0.ipaddress $$userB:$$passwordB sudo /bin/bash /home/test/ab-execution.sh $$concurrent $$noOfRequests vnf.ef5faf76-895b-11ea-bc55-0242ac130003.extcp.eth1.ipaddress && sleep $$sleepTime;
